name: Trippy Tavern
summary:
FEATURES
Colorful, unique drinks -- the more you progress, the more recipes you will learn.
After each round, spin for a random mod or event that will always keep the game unique and challenging.
Avoid permadeath! If you fail to pay your rent, you will lose the run and have to start over!
Save your progress and track your run history.
As you play through and earn more run victories, you will unlock new unique mods that will be added to your pool.

SUMMARY
Work your way through rounds by serving...
